title: A NEET Otaku Can also be a Light Novel Writer! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Harem   Romance   School Life   Supernatural

description: What could a NEET Otaku do in the very world he lived in a decade ago? Can he change the whole future of the Light novel industry with overwhelming imagination? or is he going to use the power of Literature to become a playboy!>
